text: Nuremberg is a 2000 Canadian-American television docudrama in 2 parts. It is based on the book Nuremberg: Infamy on Trial by Joseph E. Persico, that tells the story of the Nuremberg trials. ==Cast== *Alec Baldwin as Supreme Court Justice Robert H. Jackson *Brian Cox as Hermann GÃ¶ring *Christopher Plummer as Sir David Maxwell Fyfe *Jill Hennessy as Elsie Douglas *Matt Craven as Capt. Gustave Gilbert *Christopher Heyerdahl as Ernst Kaltenbrunner ==Other websites== * * Category:2000 movies Category:American television movies
title: Nuremberg (miniseries)
